## Reshaping data

```{r}
math_scores %>% 
    filter(student_group == "Total Population (All Students)") %>% 
    filter(grade_level == "Grade 3") %>% 
    select(school_id, contains("percent")) %>% 
    pivot_longer(cols = -c(school_id)) %>% 
    mutate(value = na_if(value, "--"))
```
